resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108642</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108642</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205507</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Language arts: esoteric vocabulary games</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sprachenkünste: geheime Wortschatzspiele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts de langage : jeux ésotériques de 
vocabulaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes da língua: jogos esoteric do 
vocabulário</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti di linguaggio: giochi esoterici di 
vocabolario</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γλωσσικές τέχνες: εσωτερικά παιχνίδια 
λεξιλογίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes del lenguaje: juegos esotéricos del 
vocabulario</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These games are based on my personal vocabulary that I come across in white papers for teaching and academia. The level is suitable for late secondary school upwards. Words are tested using mystery word games. The current database of words and definitions has a size of 40. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Spiele basieren auf meinem persönlichen 
Wortschatz, daß ich herüber in weiße Papiere für das Unterrichten 
und Akademie komme. Die Stufe ist für späte Sekundärschule 
aufwärts verwendbar. Wörter werden mit Geheimniswortspielen 
geprüft. Die aktuelle Datenbank von Wörtern und von 
Definitionen hat eine Größe von 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces jeux sont basés sur mon vocabulaire personnel
que je trouve par hasard en livres blancs pour l'enseignement et le 
milieu universitaire. Le niveau convient à l'école secondaire 
en retard vers le haut. Des mots sont testés en utilisant des 
jeux de mots de mystère. La base de données actuelle des mots 
et des définitions a une taille de 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes jogos são baseados em meu vocabulário 
pessoal que eu venho transversalmente nos papéis brancos para ensinar
e academia. O nível é apropriado para a escola secundária 
atrasada para cima. As palavras são testadas usando jogos de 
palavra do mistério. A base de dados atual das palavras e das 
definições tem um tamanho de 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi giochi sono basati sul mio vocabolario 
personale che vengo attraverso in carte bianche per l'istruzione e 
l'accademia. Il livello è adatto a scuola secondaria ritardata 
verso l'alto. Le parole sono esaminate usando i giochi di parola
di mistero. La base di dati corrente delle parole e delle 
definizioni ha un formato di 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα παιχνίδια είναι βασισμένα στο προσωπικό 
λεξιλόγιό μου ότι έρχομαι απέναντι στις Λευκές Βίβλους για τη 
διδασκαλία και τον ακαδημαϊκό κόσμο. Το επίπεδο είναι 
κατάλληλο για την πρόσφατη δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση προς τα πάνω.
Οι λέξεις εξετάζονται χρησιμοποιώντας τα παιχνίδια λέξης 
μυστηρίου. Η παρούσα βάση δεδομένων των λέξεων και των 
ορισμών έχει ένα μέγεθος 40.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos juegos se basan en mi vocabulario personal 
que vengo a través en los papeles blancos para enseñar y la 
academia. El nivel es conveniente para la última escuela 
secundaria hacia arriba. Se prueban las palabras usando juegos 
de palabra del misterio. La base de datos actual de palabras y 
de definiciones tiene una talla de 40.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:STEVEN KWONG
FN:STEVEN KWONG
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205507</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108642</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/language-arts-esoteric-vocabulary-games</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
